thread.title: What you didn't know about 2016 presidential candidates' spouses
thread.title_full: What you didn't know about 2016 presidential candidates' spouses - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: What you didn't know about 2016 presidential candidates' spouses
text:
With the field of 2016 presidential candidates so large, especially on the Republican side, it's not surprising that their spouses are a diverse group.
Among the 15 wives are a former concert violinist, a chemical engineering graduate, and a pair of big-time Wall Street executives. And of course, one of the two husbands is a former president--who happens to be from the same small town as one of the Republican couples.
You probably have heard that Melania Trump appeared in the "Sports Illustrated" swimsuit edition, but did you know one of the lower-profile wives was once on an NFL swimsuit calendar?
Click through the gallery to learn more about the candidates and their spouses.
